welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mason, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay here and discover all the amazing things this city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at CVG is the primary hub for all airlines and serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used by Delta Air Lines and its partners, with a few other airlines operating from this terminal as well.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves primarily low-cost carriers such as Allegiant Air, Frontier Airlines, and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is used by United Airlines and its partners, as well as a few other airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection in different areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cincinnati Municipal-Lunken Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
